doc:
Aleshia Brevard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aleshia_Brevard 0 Aleshia Brevard (December 9, 1937 – July 1, 2017) was an American author and actress of stage, screen, and television. She worked as an entertainer, actress, model, Playboy bunny, professor of theater, and author. She also underwent one of the first sex reassignment surgery procedures performed in the United States. Brevard lived her life outside of a wider transgender community and as a result, she was not publicly identified as transgender until publishing her memoirs in her later years. Aleshia_Brevard ( December_9_,_1937 – July_1_,_2017 ) was an_American_author_and_actress of stage , screen , and television . She worked as an_entertainer , actress , model , Playboy_bunny , professor of theater , and author . She also underwent one of the_first_sex_reassignment_surgery_procedures performed in the_United_States . Brevard lived her_life outside of a_wider_transgender_community and as a_result , she was_not_publicly_identified as transgender until publishing her_memoirs in her_later_years .
